channel.title: Loading different full screen sprites[req]
channel.description:
Currently when I go into full screen or and resizeable mode on my client it loads the same chat box sprite as in fixed, I would like to know how to change the loading sprite for full screen chat box as well as making part of the image opacity lower instead of all of it, would also like to do the opacity thing with inv area where the center is partially see threw but the borders are not.
Current chat box and inv: [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=8&u=17981640][img]http://i10.servimg.com/u/f10/17/98/16/40/fghdgh10.jpg[/img][/url] Desired: [url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=9&u=17981640][img]http://i10.servimg.com/u/f10/17/98/16/40/inv-ch10.png[/img][/url]
